name: Undead of Night
description:
DISCLAIMER: This is not a full gameplay experience. This is a quick prototype of a game made for a challenge and might be expanded if enough love and support is shown for the game. Thanks for playing!

Find gear and end this apocalypse! Is it possible!? No, actually this is an endless game so the undead have the upper hand here...

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - Move
  • Shift/Space - Sprint
  • Left Click - Use Weapon
  • Right Click - Enter / Exit Vehicles
  • TAB - Pause Game
  • Enter - Retry on Gameover

WEAPONS: 

  • Gun: 16 Bullets 
  • Throwing Knife: Bounce off other Zombies
  • Car: Run over Zombies at the cost of your Fuel Meter
